entries.name: from_list(list)
entries.desc: Turn an array of [name, version, platform] into an array of NameTuple objects.

entries.name: null()
entries.desc: A null NameTuple, ie name=nil, version=0

entries.name: to_basic(list)
entries.desc: Turn an array of NameTuple objects back into an array of

entries.name: ==(other)
entries.desc: Compare with other. Supports another NameTuple or an Array in the [name, version, platform] format.

entries.name: full_name()
entries.desc: Returns the full name (name-version) of this Gem.  Platform information is included if it is not the default Ruby platform.  This mimics the behavior of Gem::Specification#full_name.

entries.name: match_platform?()
entries.desc: Indicate if this NameTuple matches the current platform.

entries.name: prerelease?()
entries.desc: Indicate if this NameTuple is for a prerelease version.

entries.name: spec_name()
entries.desc: Return the name that the gemspec file would be

entries.name: to_a()
entries.desc: Convert back to the [name, version, platform] tuple
